item.title: BlackBerry Fun and Games
item.description: Need a break from work? How about a quick game of Guitar Hero? Right on your BlackBerry! You don’t need your console for this. Choose your favorite guitar, character, and venue, and start rocking! Yeah, you read that right â€“ Guitar Hero on your BlackBerry. Not exactly ideal for a serious meeting, but perfect for when you’re off the clock. It’s your phone, customize it with whatever helps you unwind!
